channel.title: CVE Feed for Alexander Fuchs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alexander Fuchs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-24663|2024-08-03T04:20:49.165Z -- alexander%20fuchs -- php%20everywhere
item.description: PHP Everywhere <= 2.0.3 included functionality that allowed execution of PHP Code Snippets via WordPress shortcodes, which can be used by any authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2022-24665|2024-08-03T04:20:49.088Z -- alexander%20fuchs -- php%20everywhere
item.description: PHP Everywhere <= 2.0.3 included functionality that allowed execution of PHP Code Snippets via a WordPress gutenberg block by any user able to edit posts.

item.title: CVE-2022-24664|2024-08-03T04:20:49.081Z -- alexander%20fuchs -- php%20everywhere
item.description: PHP Everywhere <= 2.0.3 included functionality that allowed execution of PHP Code Snippets via WordPress metaboxes, which could be used by any user able to edit posts.
